articles.title: VP Kamala Harris in Singapore: Which street hawker food did she try? - CNA
articles.description:
Last Sunday morning (Aug 22), United States Vice President Kamala Harris touched down in Singapore, kicking off her first official trip to Southeast Asia.

Amid her packed schedule of formal engagements over three days in Singapore, the first female US Vice…
articles.content:
And as proud Singaporeans know of our local cuisine, it certainly did not disappoint.
